text: 3:9 2 Eghaghaniba 1:10; Aghuzir Akaba 2:3-9; Hibru 5:14; Jems 1:5Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim na danightɨ, kɨ deraghvɨra nɨn gumazamizibagh ativagh men ganam. Egh kɨ fogham, arazir manam a dera, manam ikufi. Puvatɨghtɨ, kɨ manmaghɨra nɨn gumazamizir avɨrir kam gativagh men ganam? Guizbangɨra, gumazitam uabɨ me gativan iburagham. Kɨ uabɨ kɨ fofoziba bar puvatɨ.”
